texts.name: Nicolas Flamel
texts.biography:
Nicolas lost his eye during countless years of research and experiments, but he has finally succeeded.
Once he has mastered the art of transmuting metals into gold, he became deeply mistrustful and believes everyone is out there to get his riches. Surrounded by his golden creations, he rarely warms a tavernâ€™s bed.
